funde: Kusokoneza kusamutsa mphamvu popanda kunyamula zinthu
pafupipafupi: Chiwerengero cha mafunde ozungulira podutsa mfundo mu nthawi yoperekedwa
kutalika kwa mafunde: Kutalikirana pakati pa mfundo ziwiri zofananira za mafunde
matalikidwe: Kusunthika kwakukulu kwa mfundo kuchokera pamlingo wake pamafunde
kuwala: Mphamvu yamagetsi yomwe imayenda ngati mafunde
electromagnetic sipekitiramu: Kusiyanasiyana kwa ma frequency a electromagnetic wave frequency
Voteji: Kusiyana komwe kungatheke pakati pa mfundo ziwiri pagawo
magnetism: Mphamvu yoyendetsedwa ndi maginito pazinthu zina
electromagnet: Magnet opangidwa ndi mphamvu yamagetsi kudzera pa koyilo
electroscope: Chida chozindikira kupezeka ndi chizindikiro cha charger yamagetsi
dera: Njira yotsekedwa yolola kuti magetsi aziyenda
mndandanda: Kuzungulira ndi zigawo zonse zolumikizidwa mu chipika chimodzi
kufanana: Dera lokhala ndi zigawo zolumikizidwa kunthambi zambiri
kukaniza: Kutsutsana ndi kayendedwe ka magetsi mu kondakitala
lamulo la ohm: Ubale pakati pa ma voltage, apano, ndi kukana (V = IR)
mandala: Zinthu zowonekera zomwe zimatha kuyang'ana kapena kusiyanitsa kunyezimira kowala
kulingalira: Kubwerera kwa kuwala, phokoso, kapena mafunde ena kuchokera pamwamba
refraction: Kupindika kwa kuwala pamene akudutsa kuchokera ku sing'anga kupita ku ina
optics: Nthambi ya physics ikuphunzira kuwala ndi katundu wake
